abstract: China XD Electric, the country’s largest maker of electricity transmission and distribution equipment, set a modest pricing range in its I.P.O. to raise up to $1.5 billion, in the country’s first major offering this year.
snippet: China XD Electric, the country’s largest maker of electricity transmission and distribution equipment, set a modest pricing range in its I.P.O. to raise up to $1.5 billion, in the country’s first major offering this year.
lead_paragraph: China XD Electric, the country’s largest maker of electricity transmission and distribution equipment, set an unambitious pricing range in its I.P.O. to raise up to 10.27 billion renminbi ($1.5 billion), in the country’s first major offering this year, Reuters reported.

headline.main: China XD Begins New Year of I.P.O.’s Modestly
